nodes.name: methodology
nodes.description: ## 🛠️ Reproducibility Guide: Running the EFC System  ### **1. Purpose**  This guide provides the necessary steps to clone the **Energy-Flow Cosmology (EFC) Computational System** and execute its core validation and build workflows locally. The goal is to ensure **full reproducibility** of published results and to demonstrate the functionality of the system's automated pipelines (GitHub Actions).

nodes.name: personal
nodes.description: Dear,  I have never fit well into predefined frames. Not academically, not socially. Most things have moved too fast, too deep, too wide, in patterns others didn’t see. Much of what I understand disappears before I manage to explain it.  This project is the first time I’ve tried to show how I actually think.  Energy-Flow Cosmology is one part of that, but not the whole picture. What matters most t
